original_text: One day some Israelites were burying a man who had died. While they were doing that, they saw a group of fighters from Moab. So they quickly threw the dead body into Elisha's grave. When the body touched Elisha's bones, the dead man became alive again! He jumped up and he stood there!
korean_text: 마침 사람을 장사하는 자들이 그 도적 떼를 보고 그의 시체를 엘리사의 묘실에 들이던지매 시체가 엘리사의 뼈에 닿자 곧 회생하여 일어섰더라

sentences.original_text: One day some Israelites were burying a man
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 이스라엘 사람들이 한 남자를 장사하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: they saw a group of fighters from Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모압에서 온 전사 그룹을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: So they quickly threw the dead body
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 죽은 시신을 빨리 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: When the body touched Elisha's bones
the dead man became alive again
